channel.title: How do I turn off the spawn timer for the items?
channel.description: I want the items in the "itemspawnpoints.java" file to stay on the ground without disappearing all the time, how would I do that? Sorry if this is a nooby question, I'm basically picking this up as I go along.

item.title: How do I turn off the spawn timer for the items?
item.dc:creator: @Porsche_911_Freak Porsche 911 Freak
item.description:
@Porsche_911_Freak wrote:

I wanted them to stay on the ground without disappearing, not immediately flood the spot with 80 copies of the same item, but whatever, I’ll just keep it the way it is…at least then, some guy doesn’t get a load of abyssal whips or blue phats right from the start.

Also, while I’m on the topic of items, is there a way to make items stay on one floor? I’m asking this because I went upstairs in a building and the items I had on the first floor were stuck in random places on the second floor.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I turn off the spawn timer for the items?

item.description:
@KoJJ wrote:

change spawntimer -= 1; to spawntimer += 1;

item.source: How do I turn off the spawn timer for the items?

item.title: How do I turn off the spawn timer for the items?
item.dc:creator: @Porsche_911_Freak Porsche 911 Freak
item.description:
@Porsche_911_Freak wrote:

[code]// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez
import java.io.*;
public class itemspawnpoints
{
public int spawntimer = 1;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 1)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(1944, 3229, 3299, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Egg
ItemHandler.addItem(4151, 3254, 3451, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Abyssal Whip
ItemHandler.addItem(1042, 3254, 3452, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Blue Partyhat
ItemHandler.addItem(2366, 3254, 3453, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Dragon Square Shield (Left half)
spawntimer = 100;
}
}
}

public void process()
{
LoadItems();
spawntimer -= 1;
}
}[/code]

Which one are you talking about? There’s a public int and there’s the one that’s set to 100, which one do I change? I tried the one that’s set to 100, but it lags the server.

Can someone please help? I’m lost…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I turn off the spawn timer for the items?

item.title: How do I turn off the spawn timer for the items?
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

change this to:

spawntimer = 0;

Or

spawntimer = 1;
